title: Japanese Potato Salad
ingredients: ['300g potatoes, cut into cubes', '50g cucumber, seeds removed and finely diced', '20g carrot, julienned', '40g red onion, finely sliced', '20g ham, finely sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '3 tablespoons Japanese mayonnaise']
